All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    This class creates and renders the About web page.
    Account
    This class creates and manages the User accounts for the program.
    ApplicationTest  
    BasicTest  
    Bootstrap
    This class is a bootstrapper for loading data from a YAML file to fill the database and let the web app run correctly.
    CheatSheetHelper  
    Conversions
    This class contains a number of static methods to calculate new information from a Reading, converting values to other formats or standards.
    Dashboard
    This class generates and renders the Dashboard with the list of the user's Stations.
    DocViewerPlugin  
    LangMenuHelper  
    LangMenuHelper.LangMenu  
    LatestWeather
    This class contains a single static method to retrieve the most recent Reading for a station and calculate and append additional values of weather reporting for the Latest Weather summary cards.
    MaxMinValues
    A class to contain all of the methods used to analyse recent readings and to return the MAXIMUM and MINIMUM values for each of the readings from the Station.
    PlayDocumentation  
    ProfileCtrl
    This class controls displaying the user's profile and managing their personal information.
    ProjectDocumentation
    Controller to render project documentation.
    Reading
    This class creates a Reading and includes a constructor to initialise all of the class variable fields.
    ReadingCtrl
    This class controls various aspects of the Reading variables.
    Start
    This class renders and launches the Home Page.
    Station
    This class creates a Station and includes a constructor to initialise some, but not all, of the class variable fields.
    StationCtrl
    This class controls various aspects of the Station objects.
    Trends
    A class to contain all of the methods used to analyse recent readings and see if their values have been RISING or FALLING.
    User
    This class creates an instance of the User object.
    UserDetails
    This class provides a static method for obfuscating a user's password.
